Jean-Loup Guillaume
Renaud Lambiotte
Etienne Lefebvre
dcterms:description: Synthetic data generated to evaluate the performance of the clustered Gaussian graphical model method, simulating a standardized precision matrix with desired checkerboard patterns reflecting groundtruth functional clusters.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data

dcterms:creator: Carsen Stringer
Marius Pachitariu
Nicholas Steinmetz
Charu Bai Reddy
Matteo Carandini
Kenneth D. Harris
dcterms:description: Calcium imaging data from a subset of excitatory neurons in mouse visual cortex recorded using multi-plane acquisition, capturing neural activity during the presentation of natural images.
dcterms:title: Calcium Imaging Data

dcterms:creator: Carsen Stringer
Marius Pachitariu
Charu Reddy
Matteo Carandini
Kenneth D. Harris
dcterms:description: Recordings of ten thousand neurons in the visual cortex during spontaneous behaviors, providing a large dataset for analyzing neural connectivity and functional clustering.
dcterms:title: Calcium Imaging Data
